title: cant connect to league
body: i recently updated my game for the eve update and now connecting to game is kinda ify at best and the hextech repair tool crashes when i use it

replies.body: Ify how so? If you keep getting disconnected, let's double check a couple of your network settings really quickly. Look through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS. Test those two changes in a custom/practice game first, then let me know if that helps.
